sentences.en: "Holidays That Don't Cost the Earth" is a lively, informative read.
sentences.cn: 《绿色环保的假期》是本生动有趣、增长见闻的读物。
一本资料丰富且饶有趣味的书

sentences.en: Apart from the body of the book there are three informative appendices.
sentences.cn: 除正文外,该书还有三个资料丰富的附录.

sentences.en: Both men termed the meeting friendly and informative.
sentences.cn: 他们两人都称这次会晤亲切友好，使双方增进了解。

sentences.en: Burton's text is concise and informative.
sentences.cn: 伯顿的文章语言简洁，信息丰富。

sentences.en: For some buildings a vertical section is more informative than a plan.
sentences.cn: 有些建筑的立面图能比平面图提供更多的信息。
好的新闻风格明快, 内容充实.

sentences.en: Man's sense of smell is much less informative than his sight.
sentences.cn: 人的嗅觉提供的信息远不如视觉.

sentences.en: Some are quite informative on many different subjects, and others are just funny.
sentences.cn: 有的可以提供关于不同主题的信息, 有的纯粹是搞笑.

sentences.en: The book is too long but, nonetheless, informative and entertaining.
sentences.cn: 这本书篇幅太长，但是很有知识性和趣味性。

sentences.en: The informative asides about rural life make this wine guide rather special.
sentences.cn: 这些有关乡村生活的知识性解说资料使这种酒的广告词颇具特色.

sentences.en: The talk was both informative and entertaining.
sentences.cn: 这次谈话既长见识又饶有趣味。

sentences.en: The text is precise and informative.
sentences.cn: 正文内容准确，信息量大。

sentences.en: These books, while informative, are not necessarily truthful by our standards.
sentences.cn: 这些书虽然资料丰富,按照我们的标准来看, 却不一定是忠实可信的.

sentences.en: This advertising is informative and factual.
sentences.cn: 这种广告具有提供情况和符合实际的特点.
这篇文章风格明快, 内容充实.

sentences.en: This intriguing book is both thoughtful and informative.
sentences.cn: 这本引人入胜的书既有思想性又富知识性。
